title: VETRL
description: **VETRL** is a cloud-based veterinary software platform designed with modern technologies to deliver a seamless, intuitive user experience. It addresses the high financial barriers of traditional solutions, making it accessible to veterinarians, especially recent graduates eager to start their own practice. With a focus on affordability and simplicity, VETRL empowers vets worldwide to manage appointments, records, and invoicing effortlessly in one convenient, browser-based solution.
